required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of Tirzepatide (LY3298176) Compared With Dulaglutide on Major Cardiovascular Events in Participants With Type 2 Diabetes
clinical_study.official_title: The Effect of Tirzepatide Versus Dulaglutide on Major Adverse Cardiovascular Events in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes (SURPASS-CVOT)

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of the trial is to assess the efficacy and safety of tirzepatide to dulaglutide in participants with type 2 diabetes and increased cardiovascular risk.

primary_outcome.measure: Time to First Occurrence of Death from Cardiovascular (CV) Causes, Myocardial Infarction (MI), or Stroke (MACE-3)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Randomization up to Study Completion (Approximate Maximum 54 Months)
primary_outcome.description: Time to First Occurrence of a component event of MACE-3

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to Death from Any Cause
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Randomization up to Study Completion (Approximate Maximum 54 Months)
secondary_outcome.description: Time to Death from Any Cause

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Randomization up to Study Completion (Approximate Maximum 54 Months)

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to First Occurrence of MI
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Randomization up to Study Completion (Approximate Maximum 54 Months)
secondary_outcome.description: Time to First Occurrence of MI

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to First Occurrence of Stroke
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Randomization up to Study Completion (Approximate Maximum 54 Months)
secondary_outcome.description: Time to First Occurrence of Stroke

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to First Occurrence of the Expanded Composite of CV Death, MI, Stroke, Coronary Revascularization, or Hospitalization for Unstable Angina
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Randomization up to Study Completion (Approximate Maximum 54 Months)
secondary_outcome.description: Time to First Occurrence of the Expanded Composite of CV Death, MI, Stroke, Coronary Revascularization, or Hospitalization for Unstable Angina

secondary_outcome.measure: Cumulative Number of CV Deaths and Total (First and Recurrent) Heart Failure Events Requiring Hospitalization and/or Urgent Heart Failure Visits
secondary_outcome.description: Cumulative Number of CV Deaths and Total (First and Recurrent) Heart Failure Events Requiring Hospitalization and/or Urgent Heart Failure Visits

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants with More than 10% Weight Loss
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of Participants with More than 10% Weight Loss

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Body Weight
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, End of Study (Approximate Maximum 54 Months)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from Baseline in Body Weight

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Hemoglobin A1c (HbA1c)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, End of Study (Approximate Maximum 54 Months)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Urinary Albumin to Creatinine Ratio
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, End of Study (Approximate Maximum 54 Months)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from Baseline in Urinary Albumin to Creatinine Ratio

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Blood Lipids
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, End of Study (Approximate Maximum 54 Months)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from Baseline in Blood Lipids (Total Cholesterol, Low-Density Lipoprotein Cholesterol, High-Density Lipoprotein Cholesterol, and Triglycerides)

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to First Occurrence of Revascularization
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Randomization up to Study Completion (Approximate Maximum 54 Months)
secondary_outcome.description: Time to First Occurrence of Revascularization

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to First Occurrence of Hospitalization Due to Unstable Angina
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Randomization up to Study Completion (Approximate Maximum 54 Months)
secondary_outcome.description: Time to First Occurrence of Hospitalization Due to Unstable Angina

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to First Occurrence of New or Worsening Nephropathy
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Randomization up to Study Completion (Approximate Maximum 54 Months)
secondary_outcome.description: Time to First Occurrence of New or Worsening Nephropathy

secondary_outcome.measure: Cumulative Number of Primary Composite Events of CV Death and Total (First and Recurrent) MI and/or Stroke
secondary_outcome.description: Cumulative Number of Primary Composite Events of CV Death and Total (First and Recurrent) MI and/or Stroke

arm_group.description: Tirzepatide administered subcutaneously (SC) once a week.
Dulaglutide administered SC once a week.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Have a diagnosis of type 2 diabetes
- Have confirmed atherosclerotic cardiovascular disease
- HbA1c ≥7.0% to ≤10.5%
- Body mass index (BMI) ≥25 kilograms per meter squared (kg/m²)
Exclusion Criteria:
- Have had a major cardiovascular event within the last 60 days
- Have type 1 diabetes mellitus
- Have a history of severe hypoglycemia and/or hypoglycemia unawareness within the last 6 months
- Are currently planning treatment for diabetic retinopathy and/or macular edema
- Currently planning a coronary, carotid, or peripheral artery revascularization
- Have a history of pancreatitis
- Have a history of ketoacidosis or hyperosmolar state/coma
- Have a known clinically significant gastric emptying abnormality, have undergone or currently planning any gastric outlet obstruction, or have undergone or currently planning any gastric bypass (bariatric) surgery or restrictive bariatric surgery
- Have a history of an active or untreated malignancy or are in remission from a clinically significant malignancy for less than 5 years
- Have a family or personal history of medullary thyroid carcinoma (MTC) or multiple endocrine neoplasia syndrome type 2 (MEN-2)
- Have had a blood transfusion or severe blood loss within 90 days prior to screening or have known hematological conditions that may interfere with HbA1c measurement

link.description: A Study of Tirzepatide (LY3298176) Compared With Dulaglutide on Major Cardiovascular Events in Participants With Type 2 Diabetes

clinical_study.keyword: Hormones, Hormone Substitutes, and Hormone Antagonists

patient_data.ipd_description: Anonymized individual patient level data will be provided in a secure access environment upon approval of a research proposal and a signed data sharing agreement.
patient_data.ipd_time_frame: Data are available 6 months after the primary publication and approval of the indication studied in the US and EU, whichever is later. Data will be indefinitely available for requesting.
patient_data.ipd_access_criteria: A research proposal must be approved by an independent review panel and researchers must sign a data sharing agreement.
